enum: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

allOf.title: Resource
allOf.description: Group of items providing Information about a resource. Resources can be, for example, files or parts of them (e.g. datasets or study documents such as study protocols or questionnaires) or also abstractions (e.g. studies or substudies/data collection events).

identifier.title: ID of the [RESOURCE]
identifier.description: Unique identifier of the resource used for identification within the NFDI4Health.

classification.title: Classification of the resource within the predefined categories
classification.description: Group of items providing Information about classification of the resource within the predefined categories.

type.title: Type of the resource
type.input_help: You can register a study, a study protocol, a questionnaire, etc. Please only add follow up questionnaires if baseline questionnaires have already been registered.

titles.title: Title(s)/name(s) of the [RESOURCE]
titles.description: Group of items providing Information about title(s)/name(s) of the [RESOURCE].

text.title: Title/name
text.description: Scientific unabbreviated title or name of the [RESOURCE].
text.input_help: Please provide at least one title/name of the [RESOURCE]. If the original title is not in English, please also provide an English translation of the original title.

acronyms.title: Acronym(s) of the [RESOURCE]
acronyms.description: Group of items providing Information about acronym(s) of the [RESOURCE].

text.title: Acronym
text.input_help: The property refers primarily to studies which often have an acronym. For other types of resources, a short title (preferably up to 5 words) can be provided, e.g. 'NAKO-COVID Questionnaire'.

descriptions.title: Description(s) of the [RESOURCE]
descriptions.description: Group of items with description(s) of the [RESOURCE].

text.title: Description
text.description: Short plain text summary of the [RESOURCE].
text.input_help: Please provide a description in the original language of the [RESOURCE]. If the original language is not English, please also provide a full English translation of the description.

keywords.title: Keyword(s) describing the [RESOURCE]
keywords.description: Group of items providing Information about keywords describing the [RESOURCE].

label.title: Keyword
label.input_help: Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT.

code.title: Code of the keyword
code.description: If known, the code of the keyword in a classification/vocabulary.
code.input_help: If found, the code from the classification/vocabulary used.

languages.title: Language(s) of the [RESOURCE]
languages.description: Language(s) in which the [RESOURCE] is conducted/provided.

webpage.title: Web page of the [RESOURCE]
webpage.description: If existing, a link to the web page directly relevant to the [RESOURCE].

contributors.title: Contributor(s)
contributors.description: Group of items providing information about person(s), group(s) of persons or institution(s)/organisation(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].

nameType.title: Is it a personal or organisational contribution?

email.title: Email address
email.description: Email address of the person, group of persons or institution/organisation.

phone.title: Phone number
phone.description: Phone number of the person, group of persons or institution/organisation.
phone.input_help: Please, use the International ITU-T E.164-number structure for geographic areas, e.g. +49 (0)153 1112233.

affiliations.title: Further information about organisation(s) associated with the contributor
affiliations.description: Group of items providing further information about the organisation(s) associated with the contributor.

name.title: Name of the organisation
name.description: Name of the organisation associated with the contributor.
name.input_help: If you are have already entered the name of the organistion in the field 'Name of the organisation/institution/group', please repeat it here.

address.title: Address of the organisation
address.description: Address of the organisation associated with the contributor.

webpage.title: Web page of the organisation
webpage.description: Web page of the organisation associated with the contributor.

identifiers.title: Digital identifier(s) of the organisation
identifiers.description: Group of items providing information about identifiers of the organisation.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Digital identifier according to a specific scheme that uniquely identifies the organisation.
identifier.input_help: Preferably, provide an identifier from ROR (https://ror.org/search).

scheme.title: Identifier scheme
scheme.input_help: Which type of identifer is reported?

idsAlternative.title: Alternative identifiers
idsAlternative.description: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) assigned to the given [RESOURCE] by another registering systems, e.g. a registry of clinical trials or a data repository.
idsAlternative.input_help: If the [RESOURCE] is registered in other systems (e.g. a registry of clinical trials or a data repository), you can provide corresponding identifier(s) here.

scheme.title: Type of the registry
scheme.description: Type/name of the system where the given [RESOURCE] is already registered.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Identifier (ID) assigned to the given [RESOURCE] by another registering system, e.g. by a registry of clinical trials or a data repository.

ids.title: Related resources
ids.description: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) of the resources related to the given [RESOURCE], e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents or links to web pages.
ids.input_help: If existing, you can specify identifier(s) of any related resources, e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents, links to web pages, etc.

identifier.title: Identifier of the related resource
identifier.description: Identifier (ID) related to, or associated with, the [RESOURCE] being registered. These can be IDs of related publications, datasets, study documents, web pages, etc.
identifier.input_help: a) Publications like journal articles usually have a DOI, e.g. 10.3238/arztebl.2020.0861. b) A link (URL) starting with 'http(s)://' to a web page with any additional information can also be provided here.

scheme.title: Type of the identifier
scheme.description: Type of the identifier of the related resource.
scheme.input_help: Select one value from the list.

relationType.title: Relationship between this [RESOURCE] (A) and the related resource (B)?
relationType.description: Relationship between the [RESOURCE] being registered (A) and the related resource (B).
relationType.input_help: Select one value from the list.
enum: A is new version of B
A is previous version of B
A is variant form of B
A is original form of B

typeGeneral.title: Type of the related resource
typeGeneral.description: Type of the related resource, e.g. journal article, dataset, text, etc.
typeGeneral.input_help: Select one value from the list. For example, a journal article, dataset, text, etc.

idsNfdi4health.title: Related (sub-)studies, study documents, etc. registered on this portal
idsNfdi4health.description: Group of items providing information about related resources registered on this portal.
idsNfdi4health.input_help: Does the [RESOURCE] have any related resources registered on this portal?

identifier.title: Identifier of the related resource
identifier.description: Identifier (ID) of the related resource assigned on this portal.

date.title: Date of ID assignment
date.description: Date when the identifier of the related resource was assigned.

relationType.title: Relationship between this [RESOURCE] (A) and the related resource (B)?
relationType.description: Relationship between the [RESOURCE] being registered (A) and the related resource (B).
enum: A is new version of B
A is previous version of B
A is variant form of B
A is original form of B

provenance.title: Information about provenance aspects of the data entry
provenance.description: Group of items providing information about provenance aspects of the data entry on the portal.

dataSource.title: Source of information about the [RESOURCE]
dataSource.description: Source of information about the [RESOURCE] and the way it was uploaded/collected.

verificationDate.title: Verfication date
verificationDate.description: Date on which the responsible party last verified the information about the [RESOURCE], even if no additional or updated information is being submitted.

verificationUser.title: User who last verified the [RESOURCE]
verificationUser.description: User who last verified the information about the [RESOURCE].
enum: Names from the list of users

firstSubmittedDate.title: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first submitted for publication
firstSubmittedDate.description: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first submitted for publication.

firstSubmittedUser.title: User who first submitted the [RESOURCE] for publication
firstSubmittedUser.description: User who first submitted the [RESOURCE] for publication.
enum: Names from the list of users

firstPostedDate.title: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first posted/published
firstPostedDate.description: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first posted/published.

firstPostedUser.title: User who first posted/published the [RESOURCE]
enum: Names from the list of users

lastUpdateSubmittedDate.title: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was submitted for publication
lastUpdateSubmittedDate.description: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was submitted for publication.

lastUpdateSubmittedUser.title: User who submitted the last update of the [RESOURCE]
lastUpdateSubmittedUser.description: User who submitted the last update of the [RESOURCE].
enum: Names from the list of users

lastUpdatePostedDate.title: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was posted/published
lastUpdatePostedDate.description: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was posted/published.

lastUpdatePostedUser.title: User who posted/published the last update
lastUpdatePostedUser.description: User who posted/published the last update.
enum: Names from the list of users

resourceVersion.title: Version number of the [RESOURCE] within the portal/system
resourceVersion.description: Version number of the [RESOURCE] within the portal/system.

typeGeneral.title: In what form is the [RESOURCE] available?
typeGeneral.description: Specific information about the form in which the [RESOURCE] is available.
typeGeneral.input_help: You can select 'Text' for most of the study documents, e.g. for questionnaires, informed consent forms, case report forms, etc.

nonStudyDetails.title: Detailed information about the [RESOURCE]
nonStudyDetails.description: Group of items applicable only to the resources which are not a study/substudy, a dataset, a registry, or a secondary data source.

version.title: Version of the [RESOURCE]
version.description: If applicable, the version number of the [RESOURCE].

format.title: Format of the [RESOURCE]
format.description: The file format of the [RESOURCE] (E.g., XML, PDF, XLSX, etc.).

useRights.title: Information about the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE]
useRights.description: Group of items providing Information about the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].

label.title: License
label.description: License defining the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].
label.input_help: Select one value from the list. If “Other” is selected, an explanation of the (re-)use terms and conditions has to be provided in the field “Additional information about use rights”.
enum: CC BY-NC 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial 4.0 International)
CC BY-SA 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International)
CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial Share Alike 4.0 International)

description.title: Additional information about use rights
description.description: Any additional descriptive information explaining terms and conditions to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].

confirmations.title: Important information about licensing, if a Creative Commons license is selected.
confirmations.description: Group of items applicable if a Creative Commons license is selected.

authority.title: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have authority to license it?
authority.description: Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have authority to license it.

terms.title: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have read and understood the terms of the chosen license?
terms.description: Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have read and understood the terms of the chosen license.

irrevocability.title: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is irrevocable?
irrevocability.description: Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is not revocable.

supportByLicensing.title: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] allow NFDI4Health to license the document?
supportByLicensing.description: Confirmation that NFDI4Health is allowed to license the document, i.e. to mark the [RESOURCE] with the license information.

organisational.title: Details about the organisation/institution/group/etc.
organisational.description: Group of items providing information about group(s) of persons, institution(s) or organisation(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].
organisational.input_help: Organisational name can be used to denote a research group or an institution.

type.title: Contributor type
type.description: Contributor type an organisation, institution or group fulllfils. For example, this can be a sponsor of the study or a group of authors of the document.
type.input_help: Which contributor type does the organisation/institution/group/etc. fulllfil? Select one value from the list.

name.title: Name of the organisation/institution/group
name.description: Name of the organisation, institution or group.

fundingIds.title: Funding identifier(s)
fundingIds.description: Identifier(s) assigned by a funder to the [RESOURCE].
fundingIds.input_help: If available, you can enter funding identifiers.

personal.title: Details about the person
personal.description: Group of items providing information about person(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].

type.title: Contributor type
type.description: Contributor type a person fulllfils. For example, this can be a principal investigator of a study or an author of a document.
type.input_help: Which contributor type does the person fulllfil? Select one value from the list.

identifiers.title: Digital identifier(s) of the person
identifiers.description: Group of items providing information about digital identifiers of the person.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Digital identifier according to a specific scheme that uniquely identifies the person.

scheme.title: Which type of identifier is reported?

design.title: Characteristics of the [RESOURCE]
design.description: Group of items providing information about the characteristics of a [RESOURCE].

conditions.title: Primary health condition(s) or disease(s) of the [RESOURCE]
conditions.description: Group of items providing information about primary health condition(s) or disease(s) considered in the [RESOURCE].

label.title: Name of the primary health condition or disease of the [RESOURCE]
label.description: Name of primary health condition or disease considered in the [RESOURCE].
label.input_help: Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT (https://browser.ihtsdotools.org).

classification.title: Terminology/classification
classification.description: Terminology/classification used for the health condition or disease.
classification.input_help: If used, name of the terminology/classification.

code.title: Code ---- If known, code of the health condition or disease in the terminology/classification used
code.description: Code of the health condition or disease in the terminology/classification used.
code.input_help: If found, the code from the terminology/classification used.

focus.title: Primary focus of the [RESOURCE]
focus.description: Group of items providing information about the focus of the [RESOURCE] (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.).

label.title: Focus of the [RESOURCE]
label.description: Focus of the [RESOURCE] (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.).
label.input_help: Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT (https://browser.ihtsdotools.org).

classification.title: Terminology/classification
classification.input_help: If used, name of the terminology/classification.

code.title: Code ---- If known, code of the focus in the terminology/classification used
code.description: Code of the focus in the terminology/classification used.
code.input_help: If found, the code from the terminology/classification used.

groupsOfDiseases.title: Which groups of diseases or conditions were the data collected on?
groupsOfDiseases.description: Group of items providing information about groups of diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the [RESOURCE].

generally.title: Which groups of diseases or conditions were the data collected on?
generally.description: Groups of diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the [RESOURCE].
generally.input_help: Select all that apply. For more information about the groups of diseases/conditions, visit the WHO's ICD-10 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.

enum: Diseases of the blood or blood-forming organs and certain disorders involving the immune mechanism (III)
Diseases of the eye and adnexa (VII)
Diseases of the ear or mastoid process (VIII)
Diseases of the skin and subcutaneous tissue (XII)
Diseases of the musculoskeletal system and connective tissue (XIII)
Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period (XVI)
Congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities (XVII)
Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified (XVIII)
Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes (XIX)
External causes of morbidity or mortality (XX)
Factors influencing health status and contact with health services (XXI)

conditions.title: On which other diseases or conditions were the data collected?
conditions.description: Other diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the [RESOURCE].
conditions.example: Values are based on lower level ICD-10
conditions.input_help: Select all that apply. For more information about the groups of diseases/conditions, visit the WHO's ICD-10 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.

enum: Intestinal infection due to other Vibrio (1A01)

administrativeInformation.title: Administrative information
administrativeInformation.description: Group of items providing administrative information about the [RESOURCE].

ethicsCommitteeApproval.title: Status of the ethics committee approval
ethicsCommitteeApproval.description: Status of the [RESOURCE] approval from the (leading) ethics committee.
enum: Request for approval not yet submitted
Request for approval submitted, approval pending
Request for approval submitted, approval granted
Request for approval submitted, exempt granted
Request for approval submitted, approval denied
Study withdrawn prior to decision on approval

startDate.title: Start date of data collection for the [RESOURCE]
startDate.description: Start date of data collection for the [RESOURCE].
startDate.input_help: In case of a planned [RESOURCE], it is the intended start date; in case of an ongoing [RESOURCE] — the actual start date.

endDate.title: End date of data collection for the [RESOURCE]
endDate.description: In case of a [RESOURCE] with patients or other participants, it is the date when the last participant is examined or receives an intervention, or the date of the last participant’s last visit.
endDate.input_help: In case of a planned or ongoing [RESOURCE], it is the intended end date; in case of a completed [RESOURCE] — the actual end date.

subject.title: Primary [RESOURCE] subject
subject.description: Primary [RESOURCE] subject, i.e. a person, an animal or some other type of the subject.
subject.input_help: Select one value from the list.

dataSource.title: Data sources from which [RESOURCE] data are generated or extracted.
dataSource.description: Group of items providing information about data sources from which [RESOURCE] data are generated or extracted.

general.title: Data sources for the [RESOURCE] (e.g. biosamples, registries, questionnaires, etc.)
general.description: Different types of data sources from which [RESOURCE] data are generated or extracted.

description.title: Additional information about data sources
description.description: If needed, additional descriptive information about [RESOURCE] data sources, e.g. indication of the data source(s) not listed in the property „Data sources for the [RESOURCE]” or more detailed description of the selected data sources.
description.input_help: E.g., indication of the data source(s) not listed in the field „Data sources for the [RESOURCE]” or more detailed description of the selected data sources.

eligibilityCriteria.title: Eligibility criteria for [RESOURCE] participants
eligibilityCriteria.description: Group of items providing information about eligibility criteria for [RESOURCE] participants.

ageMin.title: Eligibility criteria: Minimum age
ageMin.description: Group of items providing information about the minimum eligible age of [RESOURCE] participants.

number.title: Minimum eligible age
number.description: Numerical value of the minimum age of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE].
number.input_help: If age is less than 1 year, please indicate a value in months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, or weeks of gestation.

timeUnit.title: Unit of age
timeUnit.description: Unit of measurement used to describe the minimum eligible age.

ageMax.title: Eligibility criteria: Maximum age
ageMax.description: Group of items providing information about the maximum eligible age of [RESOURCE] participants.

number.title: Maximum eligible age
number.description: Numerical value of the maximum age of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE].
number.input_help: If age is less than 1 year, please indicate a value in months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, or weeks of gestation.

timeUnit.title: Unit of age
timeUnit.description: Unit of measurement used to describe the maximum eligible age.

genders.title: Eligible gender
genders.description: Gender of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE].

inclusionCriteria.title: Inclusion criteria
inclusionCriteria.description: Inclusion criteria for participation in the [RESOURCE].
inclusionCriteria.input_help: If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion.

exclusionCriteria.title: Exclusion criteria
exclusionCriteria.description: Exclusion criteria for participation in the [RESOURCE].
exclusionCriteria.input_help: If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion.

population.title: Population of the [RESOURCE]
population.description: Group of items providing information about the population of the [RESOURCE]

coverage.title: Coverage of the [RESOURCE]
coverage.description: Specification of the recruitment area of the [RESOURCE]
coverage.input_help: Select one value from the list.

countries.title: Country(ies) where the [RESOURCE] takes place
countries.description: Country or countries where the [RESOURCE] takes place.

region.title: Regions and/or cities within a country where the [RESOURCE] takes place
region.description: If applicable, region(s) and/or city(ies) within a country where the [RESOURCE] takes place.

description.title: Description of [RESOURCE] population
description.description: Additional descriptive information providing more details about [RESOURCE] population.
description.input_help: Any information important for the given [RESOURCE] population can be specified here.

obtainedSampleSize.title: Obtained sample size
obtainedSampleSize.description: Obtained number of observational units for the whole [RESOURCE] (e.g. obtained number of [RESOURCE] participants at all [RESOURCE] sites). The value is only available after the end of recruitment.

outcomes.title: Outcome measure(s)
outcomes.description: Group of items providing information about outcome measure(s).

title.title: Name of the outcome measure
title.description: Name of the outcome measure. For non-interventional studies, this can be the name of specific measurement(s) or observation(s) used to describe patterns of diseases or traits or associations with exposures, risk factors or treatment.
title.input_help: For non-interventional studies, this can be specific measurement(s) or observation(s) used to describe patterns of diseases or traits or associations with exposures, risk factors or treatment.

description.title: Description of the outcome measure
description.description: Additional descriptive information about the given outcome.

timeFrame.title: Time point(s) of assessment
timeFrame.description: Description of the time point(s) at which the measurement for the outcome is assessed, e.g. the specific duration of time over which each participant is assessed.

comment.title: Any additional information about the [RESOURCE]
comment.description: Any additional information about specific aspects of the [RESOURCE] that cannot be captured by other fields.
comment.input_help: Any additional information about specific aspects of the [RESOURCE] that cannot be captured by other fields.

dataSharingPlan.title: Information about data sharing
dataSharingPlan.description: Group of items providing information about the data sharing strategy of the [RESOURCE].

generally.title: Is it planned to share the data?
generally.description: Indication whether there is a plan to make data collected in the [RESOURCE] available. In case of a [RESOURCE] with patients or other individuals, this refers to individual participant data (IPD).
generally.input_help: Select one value from the list.
enum: Yes, there is a plan to make data available
No, there is no plan to make data available
Undecided, it is not yet known if data will be made available

description.title: Additional information about data sharing
description.description: Additional descriptive information providing more details about the data sharing, e.g. indication what data in particular will be shared or why the data will not be shared or why it is not yet decided.
description.input_help: Please indicate here what data in particular will be shared or why the data will not be shared or why it is not yet decided.

datashield.title: Is the DataSHIELD/Opal infrastructure available?
datashield.description: Indication, whether the DataSHIELD/Opal infrastructure is available.

url.title: Web page with additional information about data sharing
url.description: If existing, a link to the web page where additional information about data sharing can be found.

primaryDesign.title: Is it an interventional or non-interventional [RESOURCE]?
primaryDesign.description: Non-interventional [RESOURCE] design refers to a [RESOURCE] that does not aim to alter [RESOURCE] outcomes of interest. Interventional [RESOURCE] design refers to a [RESOURCE] that aims to alter [RESOURCE] outcomes of interest.
primaryDesign.input_help: Select between non-interventional and interventional [RESOURCE] design.

studyType.title: Specification of [RESOURCE] type
studyType.description: Group of items providing information about the [RESOURCE] type.

interventional.title: [RESOURCE] type
interventional.description: The strategy for assigning interventions to participants.
interventional.input_help: Select all that apply. If 'Other' is selected, please specify the [RESOURCE] type in the field 'Additional information about the [RESOURCE]'.

nonInterventional.title: [RESOURCE] type
nonInterventional.description: The primary strategy for participant identification and follow-up.
nonInterventional.input_help: Select all that apply. If 'Other' is selected, you can specify the [RESOURCE] type in the field 'Additional information about the [RESOURCE]'.

mortalityData.title: Were mortality data collected?
enum: Yes, vital status only (cause of death missing)

status.title: Overall [RESOURCE] status
status.input_help: Select one value from the list.
enum: Ongoing (I): Recruitment ongoing, but data collection not yet started
Ongoing (II): Recruitment and data collection ongoing
Ongoing (III): Recruitment completed, but data collection ongoing
Ongoing (IV): Recruitment and data collection completed, but data quality management ongoing
Suspended: Recruitment, data collection, or data quality management, halted, but potentially will resume
Terminated: Recruitment, data collection, data and quality management halted prematurely and will not resume
Completed: Recruitment, data collection, and data quality management completed normally
Ongoing (I): Recruitment ongoing, but data collection not yet started
Ongoing (II): Recruitment and data collection ongoing
Ongoing (III): Recruitment completed, but data collection ongoing
Ongoing (IV): Recruitment and data collection completed, but data quality management ongoing

statusWhenIntervention.title: Do participants receive an intervention?
statusWhenIntervention.description: Specification whether [RESOURCE] participants receive intervention or have completed it but are still being followed according to the primary objective of the [RESOURCE].
statusWhenIntervention.input_help: Select one value from the list.

enum: Suspended: Recruitment, data collection, or data quality management, halted, but potentially will resume
Terminated: Recruitment, data collection, data and quality management halted prematurely and will not resume

stageStopped.title: At what stage was the [RESOURCE] stopped?
stageStopped.description: If the [RESOURCE] was stopped prematurely, specification of the stage at what it was halted.
stageStopped.input_help: Select one value from the list.
enum: Ongoing (I): Recruitment ongoing, but data collection not yet started
Ongoing (II): Recruitment and data collection ongoing
Ongoing (III): Recruitment completed, but data collection ongoing
Ongoing (IV): Recruitment and data collection completed, but data quality management ongoing
Suspended: Recruitment, data collection, or data quality management, halted, but potentially will resume
Terminated: Recruitment, data collection, data and quality management halted prematurely and will not resume

reasonStopped.title: Reason why the [RESOURCE] was stopped
reasonStopped.description: If the [RESOURCE] was stopped prematurely, specification of the reason(s) why it was halted.
reasonStopped.input_help: E.g., closed due to toxicity / closed due to lack of [RESOURCE] progress / temporarily-closed per [RESOURCE] design /etc.

statusEnrollingByInvitation.title: Are participants enrolled by invitation?
statusEnrollingByInvitation.description: Specification whether [RESOURCE] participants have been selected from a predetermined population.

recruitmentStatusRegister.title: Overall recruitment status of the [RESOURCE] from the register of clinical trials
recruitmentStatusRegister.description: Overall recruitment status of the [RESOURCE] as indicated in the corresponding register of clinical trials.

centers.title: Is it a mono- or multicentric [RESOURCE]?
centers.description: Specification whether a [RESOURCE] is conducted at one [RESOURCE] center or at more than one [RESOURCE] center.

centersNumber.title: Number of [RESOURCE] centers
centersNumber.description: Number of centers involved in the [RESOURCE].

dataProviders.title: Is this [RESOURCE] occurring from one or more data providers?
dataProviders.description: Specification whether this [RESOURCE] is occuring from one data provider or at more than one data provider.

dataProvidersNumber.title: Number of [RESOURCE] data providers
dataProvidersNumber.description: Number of data providers involved in the [RESOURCE].

sampling.title: Sampling method
sampling.description: Group of items providing information about the applied sampling method.
sampling.input_help: Select one value from the list.

method.title: Applied sampling method
method.description: Type of the sampling method applied for the selection of [RESOURCE] participants.
method.input_help: Select one value from the list.

probabilityMethod.title: Specific type of probability sampling
probabilityMethod.description: Specific type of the probability sampling method applied for the selection of [RESOURCE] participants.
probabilityMethod.input_help: If known, select one value from the list.

nonProbabilityMethod.title: Specific type of non-probability sampling
nonProbabilityMethod.description: Specific type of the probability sampling method applied for the selection of [RESOURCE] participants.
nonProbabilityMethod.input_help: If known, select one value from the list.

biosamples.title: Biosamples collected in the [RESOURCE]
biosamples.description: Specification of biosamples collected in the [RESOURCE].

imaging.title: Imaging data collected in the [RESOURCE]
imaging.description: Specification of imaging data collected in the [RESOURCE].

omics.title: Omics technology used in the [RESOURCE]
omics.description: Specification of omics technology applied in the [RESOURCE].

primaryPurpose.title: Primary purpose of the [RESOURCE]
primaryPurpose.description: Specification of the main purpose of the [RESOURCE].
primaryPurpose.input_help: Foremost for interventional studies, please specify the primary purpose why the [RESOURCE] was conducted. For non-interventional studies, this field may be 'Not appplicable' as multiple purposes may be defined as primary ones.

targetSampleSize.title: Target sample size
targetSampleSize.description: Intended number of observational units for the whole [RESOURCE] (e.g. intended number of [RESOURCE] participants at all [RESOURCE] sites).

hypotheses.title: Research questions and/or hypotheses underlying the [RESOURCE]
hypotheses.description: Statement of the research questions and/or hypotheses underlying the [RESOURCE].

arms.title: Arms of the [RESOURCE]
arms.description: Group of items providing information about arms of the [RESOURCE].

label.title: Name of the arm
label.description: Short name used to identify the arm.

type.title: Role of the arm
type.description: Role of the given arm in the [RESOURCE].
type.input_help: Select one value from the list.

description.title: Additional information about the arm
description.description: Additional descriptive information about the given arm.

groups.title: Groups/cohorts of the [RESOURCE]
groups.description: Group of items providing information about groups/cohorts of the [RESOURCE].

label.title: Name of the group
label.description: Short name used to identify the group.

description.title: Additional information about the group
description.description: Additional descriptive information about the given group.

interventions.title: Interventions of the [RESOURCE]
interventions.description: Group of items providing information about [RESOURCE] interventions.

name.title: Name of the intervention
name.description: A short descriptive name of the intervention.
name.input_help: If the same intervention is associated with more than one arm, provide the information once and use the field 'Name of the arm associated with the given intervention' to associate it with more than one arm.

type.title: Type of the intervention
type.description: General type of the given intervention.
enum: Genetic (including gene transfer, stem cell and recombinant DNA)
Combination product (combining a drug and device, a biological product and device; a drug and biological product; or a drug, biological product, and device)

description.title: Additional information about the intervention
description.description: If needed, additional descriptive information about the given intervention.

armsLabel.title: Name of the arm(s) associated with the given intervention
armsLabel.description: Name of the [RESOURCE] arm(s) associated with the given intervention.

exposures.title: Exposures of the [RESOURCE]
exposures.description: Group of items providing information about [RESOURCE] exposures.

type.title: Type of the exposure
type.description: General type of the given exposure.
enum: Genetic (including gene transfer, stem cell and recombinant DNA)
Combination product (combining a drug and device, a biological product and device; a drug and biological product; or a drug, biological product, and device)

description.title: Additional information about the exposure
description.description: If needed, additional descriptive information about the given exposure.

name.title: Name of the exposure
name.description: A short descriptive name of the exposure.
name.input_help: If the same exposure is associated with more than one group, provide the information once and use the field 'Name of the group associated with the given exposure' to associate it with more than one group.

groupsLabel.title: Name of the group(s) associated with the given exposure
groupsLabel.description: Name of the [RESOURCE] group(s) associated with the given exposure.

enum: Yes, there is a plan to make data available

supportingInformation.title: Supporting documents available in addition to the data
supportingInformation.description: Supporting information/documents which will be made available in addition to the [RESOURCE] data.

enum: Yes, there is a plan to make data available

timeFrame.title: When and for how long will the data be available?
timeFrame.description: Indication when the data and, if applicable, supporting documents will become available and for how long.

enum: Yes, there is a plan to make data available

accessCriteria.title: Criteria for the data access
accessCriteria.description: Indication by what access criteria data will be shared, including: a) with whom, b) for what types of analyses, and c) by what mechanism.
accessCriteria.input_help: Please provide here with whom, for what types of analyses and by what mechanism the data will be shared.

recordLinkage.title: Is record linkage with other data sources possible?
recordLinkage.description: Indication if record linkage is possible.

nonInterventional.title: Information about specific aspects of a non-interventional [RESOURCE]
nonInterventional.description: Group of items providing information about specific aspects of a non-interventional [RESOURCE].

targetFollowUpDuration.title: Target follow-up duration of the [RESOURCE]
targetFollowUpDuration.description: If applicable, anticipated time period over which each participant was followed.

number.title: Target follow-up duration
number.description: Numerical value of the target follow-up duration.

frequency.title: How many follow-ups were conducted?
frequency.description: The number of follow-ups conducted within the specified duration.

biospecimenRetention.title: Which biosamples are retained in a biorepository?
biospecimenRetention.description: Indication whether samples of biomaterial from [RESOURCE] participants are retained in a biorepository.

timePerspectives.title: Temporal design of the [RESOURCE]
timePerspectives.description: Temporal design of the [RESOURCE], i.e. the relationship of observation period to time of participant enrollment.
timePerspectives.input_help: Is it a retrospective, prospective or cross-sectional [RESOURCE]?

biospecimenDescription.title: Specific types of retained biosamples
biospecimenDescription.description: Additional information about biosamples to be retained, i.e. which specific types of biospecimens will be retained (e.g. blood, serum, urine, etc.).
biospecimenDescription.input_help: Which specific types of biosamples will be retained (e.g. blood, serum, urine, etc.)?

interventional.title: Information about specific aspects of an interventional [RESOURCE]
interventional.description: Group of items providing information about specific aspects of an interventional [RESOURCE].

phase.title: Numerical phase of the [RESOURCE]
phase.description: If applicable, numerical phase of the [RESOURCE].
phase.input_help: Select one value from the list.

masking.title: Information about masking of intervention(s) assignment
masking.description: Group of items providing information about the masking of intervention(s) assignment.

general.title: Is masking of intervention(s) assignment implemented?
general.description: Indication, whether a masking (or blinding) of intervention(s) assignment is implemented (i.e., whether someone is prevented from having knowledge of the interventions assigned to individual participants).

allocation.title: Type of allocation of participants to an arm
allocation.description: Type of allocation/assignment of individual [RESOURCE] participants to an arm.
allocation.input_help: Select one value from the list.

offLabelUse.title: Off-label use of a drug product
offLabelUse.description: Unapproved (off-label) use of a drug product.
offLabelUse.input_help: Select 'Yes' or 'No' only for a drug [RESOURCE] and 'Not applicable' for any other [RESOURCE].

roles.title: Who is masked?
roles.description: If masking is implemented, the party(ies) who are masked.

description.title: Additional information about masking
description.description: If needed, additional descriptive information about masking (e.g. information about other parties who may be masked).
description.input_help: If needed, additional information about masking, e.g. other parties who may be masked.

nutritionalData.title: Nutritional data collected?
nutritionalData.description: Indication whether nutritional data was collected by the [RESOURCE].

chronicDiseases.title: Chronic diseases included?
chronicDiseases.description: Indication whether chronic diseases were addressed by the [RESOURCE].
